review_data.title: Klein und familiär
review_data.content: Kleines Restaurant mit sehr freundlicher und zuvorkommender Bedienung. Das Essen war super und wir haben die Atmosphäre dort sehr genossen....More

review_data.title: Unfreundlich, schlechtes Essen
review_data.content: Schlechter Service: Ich habe im Restaurant gegessen, dabei habe ich etwas bestellt und meine Freundinn hat ein Sandwich gegessen. Sie...More

review_data.title: this visit, not so good
review_data.content: Visited over 1 year - 2019, and it was fantastic - Food, quantity, service. Visited on 23rd December - take away only, and service was great... but quantity provided was below average. The takeaway container wasnt even full. Slightly disappointed to say the least. Not...More

review_data.title: Super kantonesische Küche!
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres und authentisches Essen! Extrem freundliche und zuvorkommende Bedienung in gemütlich, familiärem Ambiente. Wir kommen immer wieder gerne!

review_data.title: Finally, a proper Cantonese place! So friendly, too!
review_data.content: To my knowledge the only place in ZH that does Cantonese Cuisine (as opposed to the vaguely "Chinese" or "Asian" restaurants). Super friendly staff and excellent Mapo Tofu!

review_data.title: Perfect !
review_data.content: Very good food, service is perfect ! In the center of Zurich city. Typical Asian restaurant. You won't be disapointed.

review_data.title: Surprisingly tasty Chinese food in Niederdorf
review_data.content: I honestly don’t want to leave a review because I don’t want this restaurant to change ANYTHING that they are doing, or fall victim to the hype! I hope they keep making honest and tasty Cantonese food. It is arguably one of the tastiest Chinese...More

review_data.title: A new discovery!
review_data.content: My girlfried and I were walking in Niederdorff (District no 1) in Zurich, looking for a place to have an early dinner. For some reason, I was attracted by this Chinese restaurant (always love my Asian food!). So we went in and we were not...More

review_data.title: Delicious 😋
review_data.content: Yummy Cantonese foods. The keeper of the restaurant is friendly and the cooker is amazing and making some delicious Cantonese dishes. I highly recommended you to try food in Cantonese style at Long Wai in Zurich.

review_data.title: Klein und sehr fein!
review_data.content: Super nette Familie und super Essen. Wir haben es sehr genossen und wir werden bestimmt nochmals hier essen

review_data.title: home style cooking with super flavors
review_data.content: nice family ran restaurant. super nice people with a warm welcome. im getting back there as often as possible

review_data.title: Kleineres Restaurant mit sehr gutem asiatischem essen.
review_data.content: Kann ich jedem empfehlen der asiatisches essen mag. Eines der besten Restaurants in der in der stadt zürich.

review_data.title: Mittagsessen
review_data.content: Ich war am 21.08.19 über Mittag mit 4 Arbeitskolleginnen bei euch „Long Wai“ essen. Das Essen war sehr frisch zubereitet...More

review_data.title: Amazing
review_data.content: The food is actually quite nice for the price and given the location which is also very great in the city of Zurich.
